title: Timeframe

duration.description: The duration of the timeframe given in microseconds. Can be set as a string like "4h30m", "1d", etc.

start.description: The start timestamp of the timeframe.

end.description: The end timestamp of the timeframe.

description: A period of time that has duration with optional start and end timestamps formatted as [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) strings like `YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss.ffffffZ`. The microsecond precision is not mandatory, but can be practically very useful in some cases ‚è±
